com.sun.enterprise.security.auth.login

Class FileLoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.security.BasePasswordLoginModule
      • com.sun.enterprise.security.auth.login.PasswordLoginModule
        • com.sun.enterprise.security.auth.login.FileLoginModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginModule

    public class FileLoginModule
extends PasswordLoginModule
    File realm login module.

    Provides a file-based implementation of a password login module. Processing is delegated to the FileRealm class.

    See Also:
    PasswordLoginModule, FileRealm
